text: mariyu niscayanga, grantha prajalalo, kondaru allah nu visvasistaru. Mariyu varu miku avatarimpajeyabadina danini mariyu variki avatarimpajeyabadina danini (sandesanni) visvasinci, allah ku vinamrulai, allah suktulanu svalpamaina mulyaniki am'mukoru. Alanti variki vari prabhuvu vadda pratiphalam undi. Niscayanga, allah lekka tisukovatanlo ati sighrudu
